blocks.content:
Whoobe Studio you can add almost any HTML element to create layouts, pages, widgets, components without writing a single line of code.

Any element created will be serialized to create a structured JSON object that can be reused, exported within any Whoobe Studio project.

seo.title: WhoobeLand
seo.description: Create stunning landing pages without coding and with full control design.

content:
With WhoobeStudio visual blocks builder you compose your page according to the pieces of information you need to publish.


You can reuse created blocks, change layout, css classes can be customized, HTML elements can be added, copied, duplicated, moved, removed.

Your blocks are filled like a form, you stack them and create a page.


Thus means enabling maximum reusability and design control while allowing content changes with clear boundaries.



Whoobe is markup, js and styling coupling applied to webpages. All of this without coding.


You can create shareable blocks that can be used for rich editing experiences in a UI in different projects just exporting/importing them.


The ultimate scope is to build a website that has the cost and time reduction of reusing well known information archetypes expressed as blocks (head, call for action, slider, footer, etc.).


Design Control


The visual blocks builder editor gives you full control of you design. Implemented using TailwindCSS you have a granular control about your design with selectable controls and settings.

In this way you can create from simple elements to structured layout and advanced functionalities.
